channel.title: I got 2 problems
channel.description:
I use a choob isle as my source and iv attempted to change the name that the npcs and the menus say, what i do is go to client.java then i click replace then i replace choob isle with *name i chose to call my server* and after doing so i save then compile then i run my server but then..... its still the same!?
2nd problem.
I attempted adding spiecal bars but it never works Iether its the source or its because im a new coder.. Iv tried on ricscape v2, elionscape, and choob isle. none work.
im a new coder and jus started making servers about a week ago or 2. i know where everything is well mostly everything. So please help ^
Thanx,
~Robin ;)

item.title: I got 2 problems
item.dc:creator: @I_robin_I I robin I
item.description:
@I_robin_I wrote:

i know about the npc handler thing… iv tried that too. i had a few ppl helpin me out. and iv tried this on 3 sources and i think its me not the sources. the sources are great =] and my friends helpin out are prob a lil above average? =)

anyway thanks for replying and trying to help, i respect that.

Read full topic
